summary: App includes Word-to-PDF conversion and image resize flow; current focus is improving UI/UX and responsiveness across devices, especially fixing mobile overflow/styling for resize mode buttons.
known_issues: On mobile, the 'By Pixels' / 'By Percentage' / 'Target Size' controls overflow and have incorrect background color/sizing.

existing_features.title: Fix the 'By Pixels', 'By Percentage', and 'Target Size' mode controls in the Image Resize options so they do not overflow on mobile and remain usable on all screen sizes.
Update the Image Resize options form layout to prevent input/control overflow on mobile for all modes, including the Target Size input + unit selector row.
Apply consistent responsive spacing/typography improvements for the Image Resize page options section so the UI/UX looks polished across mobile, tablet, and desktop without changing tool behavior.

new_feature_requests.summary: Improve overall UI/UX and make the app fully responsive across all devices
Fix 'By Pixels', 'By Percentage', and 'Target Size' buttons on mobile (background color, sizing, and overflow) and make these controls responsive
